mapper.select: select count(*) from r_member WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into r_member (id, passwd, name, phone, address1, address2, zip1, zip2, grade, point, use_like, sex, email, jumin1, info, profileImg) values (#{member.id},#{member.passwd},#{member.name},#{member.phone}, #{member.address1},#{member.address2},#{member.zip1}, #{member.zip2},'일반',0,0,#{member.sex}, #{member.email},#{member.jumin1},#{member.info}, #{member.profileImg})
